Title: Establishes the 2-1-1 essential community services hotline system
Summary: Establishes the 2-1-1 essential community services hotline system; designates the office of children and family services to oversee the hotline system; establishes the availability and scope of information to be provided by the hotline system and requirements of call centers; requires the office of children and family services to collect certain data relating to the hotline system and to make annual reports to the governor and the legislature.
LawCode: Add Art 9 §§467 - 467-d, Soc Serv L; amd §36.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to the 2-1-1 essential community services hotline system
